Summary: Text Analytics 1
MiniProject: Mining Accident Reports
Project Objective

employers are required to report any serious work-related injuries and death to the authority . this information helps employers, workers and the authority to evaluate the safety of a workplace, understand industry hazards and implement worker protections to reduce and eliminate hazards
an example of such accident report is shown below . a similar accident report has been reported in a recent accident .
Employee Suffers Burns When Caught In Flash Fire . Employee suffers burns when caught In flash fire .

employee # 1 was heating hot asphalt oil spray wand using a propane torch . a coworker accidentally pressed the nozzle control handle that blow out hot oil and diesel . employee #1 was treated for second degree burn
assume you are engaged by a client to perform text mining on accident reports to help find answers to the following questions .
what are the major types of accidents reflected in the reports? how many accidents are caused in the report? if you have a problem with the report, please contact us.
which type of accidents has the largest number of occurrences? which types of accidents have the biggest number of accidents?
which part of the human body is injured most in the accidents? which part is the most injured in the collisions?
the dataset is in file osha.txt . the data is in the file . .
